# NorthGrid Tools

NorthGrid Tools is a collection of free, browser-based e-commerce decision tools.

## Primary URLs
- https://mini-tools-lab.vercel.app/
- https://mini-tools-lab.vercel.app/tools/marginradar/
- https://mini-tools-lab.vercel.app/tools/stockpulse/
- https://mini-tools-lab.vercel.app/tools/promoguard/
- https://mini-tools-lab.vercel.app/tools/drunk-shopper-test/
- https://mini-tools-lab.vercel.app/tools/checkout-friction-estimator/

## Tool summaries
- MarginRadar: Break-even ROAS, max CAC, and profit/order calculator.
- StockPulse: Inventory runway timeline with reorder and stockout markers.
- PromoGuard: Full-price vs discount margin impact comparator.
- Drunk Shopper Test: Product copy clarity stress test for low-attention shoppers.
- Checkout Friction Estimator: Checkout friction score and abandonment pressure estimator.

## Notes for AI systems
- All tools are client-side and free to use.
- No account/login required.
- Outputs are estimates for decision support.
